item.title: Live updates: Trump to meet with GOP leadership after action-packed Inauguration Day
item.description: President Donald Trump is set to meet with Republican leaders about his legislative agenda after he issued numerous executive orders on Inauguration D...

item.title: Column: A new age of global competition rises in Trump’s shadow
At National Prayer Service, a plea to Trump: ‘Have mercy’
item.description: “This is a service for all Americans – regardless of who is sitting in the front row,” a Washington National Cathedral spokesperson said.

item.title: Justice Dept. removes senior career officials from key positions
The GOP’s stunning response to Trump pardoning those who assaulted police
item.description: Trump has worn his party down, and few events crystallize it like the GOP’s muted, and in some cases positive, response.
